name: Silent Hill 2
description:
This script will install "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD MULTI 5 EU edition with modern computer compatibility. 
This script uses differents projects:
Sh2proxy: https://github.com/emoose/sh2proxy/releases
Silent Hill 2 Enhancement: https://github.com/elishacloud/Silent-Hill-2-Enhancements
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.

insert-disc.description: Please insert "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD1 and press autodetect

merge.description: Copying data from "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD1, please wait

insert-disc.description: Please insert "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD2 and press autodetect

merge.description: Copying data from "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD2, please wait

insert-disc.description: Please insert "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD3 and press autodetect

merge.description: Copying data from "Silent Hill 2 Director's" Cut CD3, please wait

write_file.content:
[InstallShield Silent]
Version=v6.00.000
File=Response File
[File Transfer]
OverwrittenReadOnly=NoToAll
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-DlgOrder]
Dlg0={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdWelcome-0
Count=8
Dlg1={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdLicense-0
Dlg2={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdAskDestPath-0
Dlg3={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSetupTypeEx-0
Dlg4={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSelectFolder-0
Dlg5={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-0
Dlg6={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-1
Dlg7={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdFinishReboot-0
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdWelcome-0]
Result=1
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdLicense-0]
Result=1
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdAskDestPath-0]
szDir=C:\Program Files (x86)\Konami\Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut
Result=1
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSetupTypeEx-0]
Result=Movies on Hard Disk
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSelectFolder-0]
szFolder=Konami\Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut
Result=1
[Application]
Name=Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut
Version=1.00.000
Company=Konami
Lang=0009
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-0]
Result=0
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-1]
Result=1
[{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdFinishReboot-0]
Result=1
BootOption=0

task.description: Please just click "OK" when a dialog box will ask for Disk 1
task.name: wineexec

input_menu.description: Please chose your preferred interface language:

content:
files:
- sh2proxy: https://github.com/emoose/sh2proxy/releases/download/v0.1/sh2proxy_0.1.zip
- sh2e: https://github.com/elishacloud/Silent-Hill-2-Enhancements/files/3293011/d3d8.zip
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Konami/Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut/sh2pc.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Preparing "Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut" folder
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD1 and press autodetect
    requires: sh2.ico
- merge:
    description: Copying data from "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD1, please wait
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/sh2dccd
    src: $DISC
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD2 and press autodetect
    requires: data3.cab
- merge:
    description: Copying data from "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD2, please wait
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/sh2dccd
    src: $DISC
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert "Silent Hill 2 Director's Cut" CD3 and press autodetect
    requires: data4.cab
- merge:
    description: Copying data from "Silent Hill 2 Director's" Cut CD3, please wait
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/sh2dccd
    src: $DISC
- write_file:
    content: '[InstallShield Silent]

      Version=v6.00.000

      File=Response File

      [File Transfer]

      OverwrittenReadOnly=NoToAll

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-DlgOrder]

      Dlg0={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdWelcome-0

      Count=8

      Dlg1={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdLicense-0

      Dlg2={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdAskDestPath-0

      Dlg3={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSetupTypeEx-0

      Dlg4={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSelectFolder-0

      Dlg5={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-0

      Dlg6={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-1

      Dlg7={D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdFinishReboot-0

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdWelcome-0]

      Result=1

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdLicense-0]

      Result=1

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdAskDestPath-0]

      szDir=C:\Program Files (x86)\Konami\Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut

      Result=1

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSetupTypeEx-0]

      Result=Movies on Hard Disk

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdSelectFolder-0]

      szFolder=Konami\Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut

      Result=1

      [Application]

      Name=Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut

      Version=1.00.000

      Company=Konami

      Lang=0009

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-0]

      Result=0

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-AskYesNo-1]

      Result=1

      [{D3C80E77-E549-4F76-BC07-61DDBD950345}-SdFinishReboot-0]

      Result=1

      BootOption=0'
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/sh2dccd/setup.iss
- task:
    args: /s /L0009
    description: Please just click "OK" when a dialog box will ask for Disk 1
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/sh2dccd/setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Konami/Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut/sh2pc.bak
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Konami/Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut/sh2pc.exe
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: sh2proxy
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Konami/Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut/
    src: $CACHE/bin/sh2pc.exe
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Konami/Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut/
    file: sh2e
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please chose your preferred interface language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - 1: English
    - 2: French
    - 3: German
    - 4: Italian
    - 5: Spanish
    preselect: 1
- write_file:
    content: SET DX_CONFIG_LANGUAGE $INPUT
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Konami/Silent Hill 2 - Directors Cut/language.ini
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: d3d8
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: EAXEnabled
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DirectSound
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- move:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/sh2dccd/
wine:
  Desktop: true
